summary: Email correspondence between attorneys regarding the U.S. Virgin Islands' civil RICO lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein's estate. Russell Pate announces the lawsuit filing and seeks coordination among victim attorneys for joint strategies and potential mediations, while also offering social invitations.

connections.description: Pate claims to have worked as private counsel on the USVI Attorney General's civil RICO complaint against Epstein's estate for the past four months.
Pottinger forwards Pate's email to Edwards for information and suggests making contact with Pate.
Pate emails numerous victim attorneys to announce the USVI lawsuit and propose coordinated strategies and joint mediations for Epstein estate claims.
Pate references previously using Feinberg as a mediator on a large settlement in the Virgin Islands, suggesting his potential suitability for Epstein estate mediations.

events.title: USVI Files Civil RICO Case
events.description: The U.S. Virgin Islands files a civil RICO lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein's estate.

keyFacts: The U.S. Virgin Islands filed a civil RICO lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein's estate on January 15, 2020.
Attorney Russell Pate claims to have worked as private counsel on the USVI's complaint for the four months prior to its filing.
Pate proposes coordination among victim attorneys for joint strategies and mediations to resolve claims against Epstein's estate.
Pate mentions the USVI Department of Justice investigators want to speak with victims who were trafficked to the Virgin Islands.
The email includes a social invitation from Pate for attorneys to join a pre-paid catamaran charter in the Caribbean.
